column4: I have a Question: You know how you can access your account from any computer in the School? How could I do that?
Both my Computers are running Ubuntu 10.10 and there connected to the internet through a router
FreeNX works well for shared desktops... if you can get it working.  last time I tried it was a royal pain in the ass to set up, but it's quicker than TightVNC
